ee mahathmiya ese pawasuye janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage dewani padawi prapthiyata samagamiwa lanka sathosa aayathanaye 227wani sathosa welenda aayathanaya katunayaka - siduwa welanda sankirnaye wiwrutha kirime uthsawayediya.wasadamu sathosa nawatha lanka sathosa namaya yatathe ape rate janathawa wenuwen sadharana milata athyawashya badu bhanda labadimata katayuthu kale mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumage sankalpaya yatathe jeyaraj pranandupulle ewakata siti welenda amathiwaraya bawa mama mathak karanawa.ada katana aasanaye me wiwrutha kale hayawani sathosa welenda aayathanayayi.
